Articles.Content:
Oh, you know what?

I'm going to just build a ship, and then transport it there with alt-F12!

Gotta restart KSP to change somethng in settings.cfg.

Sadly, doen't work

Other idea.
I'll stop there for today -- mabye this signal doesn't exist (sadly).
I have a feeling it was a one time gltich, there was nothing special about the signal.

Not found on KSP 1.12.3, but it's said on the wiki that the hill doesn't seem to emit any signal in KSP 1.12 -- guess the SSTVs have been removed..

I'll try with an older version.

Allright, KSP 1.2.2 won't launch, trying KSP 1.73

Download: 75%

Extractin data..
Allright it starts
U got this!

Man, the old graphics...

Still, I prefer pre-1.18 graphics.

(sorry, pre-0.18)

 

Wow, I lost my custom shortcuts

Have to put thembach

(and the keyboard of the other computer, which I use to type this, is getting worse)

Using a mammoth engine for speed needs, and the cheat meu to "set orbit" of course.

Currently at transfer orbit

Whooops overheat

Mammoth burning..

Current velocity: 40 km/s

Current altitude: 9,999,999,999,742,600,000 m

Just passed 10,000 Pm... It didn't play.

Maybe I misread it.
Maybe it happens in an earlier version, let me check.

Yet another pass...

Note:I'm using 1.7.3

Maybe it was an April fool's joke...

8 km to go, at 30 m/s...

OK, DMSP found it in 2014.

So if I find anything, I'll be the third, not the second ;

Holo's try was in December 2013.

If I can't find it in 1.7.3, I'll try 1.0 -- and if there's nothing, then we'll have to pray for someone who still has a KSP from the first half of 2014.

I think I'm not going fast enough

OK... No signal. Absolutely no signal.

HOLD ON

I JUST HEARD A BIP

JUST ONE

CAN THIS BE REAL??

There was the loud music, but I'm sure I heard a BIP

Let me check my recordings...

Downloading KSP 1.0.5...
Oh my Kraken. If this is real I will poo myself.

Recording check in progress...

I said I just heard a faint, small BIP. Not a complete SSTV signal...Although it may have been part of it.

Whoa whoa whoa that Mammoth restarting jumpscared me...

Ihad to brake and invert my trajectory

So I mustn't be that far away from the BIP

HOLD ON HOLD ON HOLD ON IT'S REAL

KRAKEN IT'S REAL

IT WAS JUST HIDDEN BY THE ****ING LOUD MUSC

BUT I HEARD bird

...

(sorry)

 

wFor everyone's information: the SSTV signal at 10,000 Pm exists in KSP 1.7.3. I found it.

Eight years after, I found it.

I have recorded it.

EDIT: No, that was just the stupid music!!
(2 nov. 2022)
 

But I can't decode it because of that ****ing loud music!!

I have to re-record it, this time without the music.

Edited November 2, 2022 by Nazalassa

I've heard a bit of bleep-boop around 25:40, but it's really faint and I had to put the sound to the maximum. Pay attention, and you'll probably hear it.

Oh, and, download the recording here.


Man, when I heard the bleep-blops it really frightened me. Really.

(rememer: jump to 20:40. Before it's not interesting. It's all KSP music and engine burning.)

aah damn keyboard

Edited March 4 by Nazalassa
The file doesn't sound like anything? Do I need to redownload?

Eight years after @Holo and @DMSP. I found it. On KSP 1.7.3.

Wow. Wow wow wow.

The file is a .mp4 -- I haven't separated the audio from the video yet.

Ah yes I se, the download link didn't work as expected.

Edited March 4 by Nazalassa
I'm really bad with github. How do I download them?

You should see a box with "View Raw (sorry blah blah blah)" written in it.

Just above the box there's a bar, which has a "Download" button on the right.

When you click on it, it *should* download the file.
Still no audio
You mean from the downloaded file?

1 minute ago, Nazalassa said:

You mean from the downloaded file?

yes

I -- I don't see what's wrong -- it works nice for me

What OS are you using, and what app are you using to play it? Maybe it can help.
I'm on windows 10 and using the movies and TV app.
OK, this is kinda stupid, but have you checked it your sound works in other apps?
